table.stmt: SELECT t3008.FItemID as CounterID ,t3008.F_110 AS CounterCode ,t3008.FName AS CounterName ,F_109 AS customerId ,F_115 AS Contact ,F_117 AS Mobile ,F_116 AS Phone ,N'中国' AS Country ,p.FName AS Province ,c.fName AS City ,F_120 AS AreaCounty ,F_106 AS AreaPrice ,F_118 AS Address ,F_118 AS Shipping_Address ,F_119 AS PostCode ,F_105 AS Channel ,t3007.FName AS Type ,s.FDeleted AS Status ,cast(getdate() AS bigint) AS lastUpdate ,t3008.FNumber as CounterType ,F_129 AS newCounter ,F_128 AS area FROM [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item_3008] t3008 JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item] t3007 ON t3008.F_101 = t3007.FItemID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item] s ON t3008.FItemID=s.FItemID JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item] p ON t3008.F_103 = p.FItemID and p.FItemClassID='3009' JOIN [AIS20130314203706].[dbo].[t_Item] c ON t3008.F_104 = c.FItemID and c.FItemClassID='3010' WHERE s.FDeleted=0 AND t3008.FName not LIKE '%撤%' AND F_109 <>0 ORDER BY p.FName

SELECT CounterID , CounterCode , CounterName , customerid , Contact , Mobile , Phone , Country , Province , City , AreaCounty , AreaPrice , Address , Shipping_Address , PostCode , Channel , Type , Status , lastUpdate , Warehouse FROM base_counter

proc.stmt: UPDATE base_counter SET CounterCode=?, CounterName=?, CustomerId=?, Contact=?, Mobile=?, Phone=?, Country=?, Province=?, City=?, AreaCounty=?, AreaPrice=?, Address=?, PostCode=?, Channel=?, Type=?, Status=?, LastUpdate=?, CounterType=?, newCounter=?, Area=? WHERE (CounterID=?)
UPDATE base_counter SET Status=?, LastUpdate=? WHERE (CounterID=?)
